trans-unit.source: Represents a container for the addresses of resources that bypass the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 表示略過 Proxy 伺服器之資源位址的容器 (Container)。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This collection holds instances of the `add` configuration element in the `bypasslist` configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合會保存的執行個體`add`中的組態項目`bypasslist`組態項目。

trans-unit.source: An `add` element specifies the address of a resource residing on a server.
trans-unit.target: `add`項目指定的位址位於伺服器上的資源。

trans-unit.source: When an application requests a resource by using the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> or <xref:System.Net.WebClient> classes, if the address of the resource is in the `bypasslist`, the request is sent directly to the server where the resource resides instead of being sent to the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式要求的資源使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>或<xref:System.Net.WebClient>類別中的資源位址是否`bypasslist`，要求直接傳送至伺服器的資源而不是傳送至 proxy 伺服器所在的位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElementCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElementCollection" /> 類別的空執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 新增項目至集合。

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除所有項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之組態項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of <paramref name="element" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element with the specified index or key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定具有指定之索引或機碼的項目。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定位於集合指定位置的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement" /> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定位置處的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The key for an element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中項目的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定具有指定索引鍵的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement" /> with the specified key, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no element with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 附指定索引鍵的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement" />，或是如果沒有附指定索引鍵的項目，則是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes an element from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合移除元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified configuration element from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合移除指定的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: The key of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的項目索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Removes the element with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 移除具有指定索引鍵的元素。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: 移除項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定索引中的項目。
